posts.post_content:
Posted By: Michael Peich
Hi All-I posted on the regular thread, but should have done so here. I am doing research on the Chicago Maroons and need any material related to them, e.g., OJs, schedules, programs, tickets, oddball cards, etc. If one of you won lot #40 in the recently completed Lipset Auction, and are interested in selling the Herman Long and Dunn cards, I'm eager to buy. Please contact me at my e-mail: mpeich@comcast.net.

                   Many thanks, Mike

Posted By: Jay Miller
Mike--Did you ever get my email? You never responded.

Posted By: Michael Peich
Hi Jay--No, I have not received your e-mail. My address is: mpeich@comcast.net. Please resend. Cheers, Mike
